metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2938 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component: InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.27 and prior and 8.0.17 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.4 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadb3 - 1:10.3.19-1
libmariadbd19 - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-backup - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-client - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-client-10.3 - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-client-core-10.3 - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-common - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-cracklib-password-check - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-client - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-server - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-rocksdb - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-server - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-server-10.3 - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-server-core-10.3 - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-test - 1:10.3.19-1
mariadb-test-data - 1:10.3.19-1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient21 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-client - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-client-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-client-core-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-router - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-server - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-server-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-server-core-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-source-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-testsuite - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
mysql-testsuite-8.0 - 8.0.18-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> since 5.5 is no longer upstream supported and so far we cannot patch it marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.3 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:10.3.19-1').
mysql-8.0 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.18-0ubuntu3').
